description:
AJCD-08 EMBROIDERED TWISTED SILK 3 PCS

By Pcs: 3 Pcs Shirt: Twisted silk Trouser: Twisted silk Dupatta: Chiffon Color: Gold

Like a gilded tapestry woven with threads of dreams and desires, this dark gold ensemble by Asim Jofa beckons you into a world of timeless elegance. The light gold cupped sequins and intricate gold zariwork sparkle casting a luminous glow upon the fabric. Hot pink and teal green threadwork intertwine creating a kaleidoscope of color and charm that dances across the shirt. Acanthus motifs, ancient symbols of beauty and grace adorn the embroidery whispering tales of tradition and heritage. With embroidered panels, borders, sleeves, and chaak, this ensemble is a testament to the beauty of craftsmanship and artistry. Draped with an embroidered dupatta, it is a vision of majesty and splendor inviting you to embrace your inner queen and shine with unparalleled grace.
                                                                                                                                    
DESIGN DETAILS:

Embroidered front center panel on twisted silk
Embroidered front side panel left & right on twisted silk
30'' embroidered back with border on twisted silk
Pair of embroidered sleeves with border on twisted silk
30'' embroidered border for front hemline on twisted silk
Embroidered chaak for front & back left & right on twisted silk
2.5 meter embroidered dupatta on chiffon
1.5 meter trouser on twisted silk
